import React, { createElement } from "react" import memesData from "./memesData" export default function Main() { let toptext = document.querySelector(".toptext") let bottomtext = document.querySelector(".bottomtext") let button = () => { let momse = memesData.data.memes const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * momse.length) const randomMeme = momse[randomIndex]; let img = console.log(randomMeme.url) } return (
) }
